page.description: Use CallStaticFunction() to call a static/class function in an arbitrary .NET class without having to register the assembly in the Alpha Anywhere type system.
page.syntax: CallStaticFunction as L (FullyQualifiedFunctionName as C,OPTIONAL Assembly as DotNet::AssemblyReference = null_value(),PARAMS Arguments as A)

section.title: Example
section.description: Calling a static function in a system class; registered in the global assembly cache (GAC).
section.example:
Dim FunctionName as C = "System::DateTime::DaysInMonth" Dim Services as DotNet::Services
If .not. Services.CallStaticFunction(FunctionName, 1959, 2) UI_Msg_Box("Error calling function " + FunctionName, \ Services.CallResult.Text) Else UI_Msg_Box("Function " + FunctionName + \ " returned the following value", "" + \ Services.CallResult.ResultDataValue) End if
